jobDescription: Geode is seeking a technology professional with asset management industry experience to assist with new technology initiatives supporting continued business growth.Responsibilities:Create and enhance database artifactsBuild database models for transactional databases and data warehousesBuild ETL loaders to populate operational repositories and data warehousesIdentify poorly performing queries and optimize for performanceIdentify and resolve data issues with production applicationsWork closely with the business teams, business analysts and developers in understanding requirements and producing high quality deliverablesWork with the database administrators to develop and support automation proceduresQualifications:5+ years of SQL development experience on SQL Server3+ years of experience with database modelling using data modelling tools2+ years of database administration experience on SQL Server databases5+ years of relevant work experience; asset management industry experience preferredExperience with master data management tools (Markit EDM, Informatica MDM) helpfulBachelor degree or higher in Computer or Information ScienceMust be detail oriented with excellent verbal and written communication skillsAbility to work and thrive under pressure in a fast paced, mission critical environment
